Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

localizeUS

public static void localizeUS()
Localizes StormChaser using the Ultrasonic Sensor. StormChaser ends up to face approximately 45 degrees.

localizeLight

@Deprecated
public static void localizeLight()
Deprecated. 

Localizes StormChaser by going to the closest intersection, rotating, and correcting it's angle relative to the line detected.

localizeLight2

@Deprecated
public static void localizeLight2()
Deprecated. 

Light localizes by hitting a vertical line, correcting y, going back, turning at 90 degrees, then hitting an horizontal line and correcting x.

lightSensorTest

public static void lightSensorTest()
Tests the LineSensor class by turning them on, and putting the robot in float mode.

navigationTest

public static void navigationTest()
Tests the Navigation class by travelling to a specific node.

CorrectionTest

public static void CorrectionTest()
Tests the OdometryCorrection class by travelling a path while it is used.

shootTest

public static void shootTest()
Tries to connect with Storm and then tells him to shoot.

shoot

public static void shoot()
Transmits the speed at which Storm should shoot. Returns when done.

connectToStorm

public static void connectToStorm()
Connects to the other NXT Brick.

Disconnects from the other NXT Brick.
